summary: This is an email from an FBI agent discussing an individual who allegedly lied during a 2016 civil deposition about their involvement with Jeffrey Epstein. The email references a prior communication and appears to be part of an investigative or legal discussion.

persons.name: Lia
persons.context: Appears as the sender of the email discussing an individual who lied in a deposition about Epstein involvement.

persons.name: SSA - FBI New York
persons.context: Referenced in the email chain as the recipient or author of a prior message on June 24, 2020.

events.title: Civil Deposition
events.description: An individual gave a deposition in a civil case where they were asked specific questions about their involvement with Jeffrey Epstein and allegedly lied.

events.title: FBI Email Correspondence
events.description: An email was sent discussing the alleged false statements made during the 2016 deposition regarding Epstein involvement.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated June 24, 2020, referencing prior FBI correspondence.
It states that an individual lied during a 2016 civil deposition when asked specific questions about their involvement with Jeffrey Epstein.
The email suggests ongoing investigative or legal interest in the truthfulness of statements made about Epstein.
The subject of the alleged false statements is not named in the provided text.
